issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.summary: BlockIdManager.clear doesn't reset the counter for blockGroupIdGenerator

comments.body: Thanks [~ehiggs] for reporting this. I think this is a bug for here. Attach a simple patch for this.

Thanks [~linyiqun], [~ehiggs]. +1 for the fix.

I've rebased the patch and added a unit test case to verify the same. Please review it. Thanks!

+1 for the latest patch.
Thanks [~rakeshr] for the test.
Pending Jenkins
